title: In pixel 4a when I am using 4G sim of airtel or Jio 4G it is showing emergency services only
content:
In pixel 4a when I am using 4G sim of airtel or Jio it is showing emergency services only .under network and internet - in mobile network -advance section  just below automatically select network  - under choose network - disconnected is written .
Whereas for cellone - it is showing network and when I am checking *#*#4636#*#* 
It shows data network type no network for 4G sim but edge for bsnl
